channel.title: ADNI on Statistical Genetics
channel.description: Recent content in ADNI on Statistical Genetics

item.title: Introduction to ADNI Dataset
item.description: What is ADNI Dataset? The Alzheimer’s Disease Neuroimaging Initiative (ADNI) unites researchers with study data as they work to define the progression of Alzheimer’s disease (AD). ADNI researchers collect, validate and utilize data, including MRI and PET images, genetics, cognitive tests, CSF and blood biomarkers as predictors of the disease. Study resources and data from the North American ADNI study are available through this website, including Alzheimer’s disease patients, mild cognitive impairment subjects, and elderly controls.
